subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kobe Bryant toyed with Orlando defenders, twisting them like corkscrews before popping open for shot after shot as the Lakers dominated the Magic, taking a 1-0 lead in the series.
snippet: Kobe Bryant toyed with Orlando defenders, twisting them like corkscrews before popping open for shot after shot as the Lakers dominated the Magic, taking a 1-0 lead in the series.
